item.title: Keto Coconut Bread
item.description: I created this recipe looking for a bread alternative not using any grains, processed sugar and processed oils. It is sitting between bread and cake feel and my wife loved it. I used pasture-raised eggs to my recipe, just because it is more nutritious. But regular eggs should be fine. â²ï¸ Prep time: 10 min ğŸ³ Cook time: 45 min ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 12 Ingredients 6 Medium Eggs (or 5 Extra Large) 1 Tbsp Coconut Oil Â¾ cup Coconut Flour 1 tsp Baking Powder Pinch of Salt Â½ tsp or less of Xanthan Gum (optional, to have a more stick bread) Directions Mix all dry ingredients in a big bowl.
